location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that the Governor approves his address to the Wahabee [Wahhabi] Chieftains.
